data.name: 4th Era - The RuneChild
data.detailed_description:
A Giant Single player RPG.
Build on the Awesome Advance Dungeon and Dragons world.
With elements from many of the most loved RPG games.

+400 hundred unique maps. From the Deep Dark Jungle, to the blinding white desert.
Tall mountains and astonishing grasslands. And large cities, with secret beneath the ground.

If You ran through the maps at top speed, it would take about 30 hours to complete.
That do not include the astounding dungeons, and the many Incredible quests.

Intro:






You start as one of 3 classes.
Fighter, Rogue, or a Mage.

Fighter, is all about large Swords and heavy Meele damage,
or keep your distance with Bows or Throwing stars.

Rogue, is Assassination and hiding in the shadows.

Mage, cast Spells and use ancient magic artefacts.


You can be 2.4 meters tall or 1 meter, with different pros and cons.

You have to design Your character abilities.
Make them super strong, but dump as a trash can..
Or super smart, but unable to lift anything, but his Wizard Staff.?



You also start with 2 Non-weapon skills, like Running, Swimming, Map Making...

When You reach Level 10, you can change to a new class, or stay in your class and become a specialist.

One of the Places You can visit:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: +2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
